questions.question: The Azure Speech Service can only process audio in real-time and does not support batch transcription.
Speaker recognition in Azure Speech Service can identify and verify a speaker based on their unique voice attributes.
Which of the following is NOT a feature of Azure Speech Service?
What is SSML used for in Text-to-Speech?
options: To adjust pitch, rate, and volume
To translate text to multiple languages
questions.answer: To adjust pitch, rate, and volume

questions.question: Which deployment option allows Azure Speech Service to run in environments with limited connectivity?
Explain one practical use case for Pronunciation Assessment in language learning applications.
questions.answer: Pronunciation Assessment provides valuable feedback on speech accuracy and fluency, helping learners improve speaking skills.

questions.question: What best practices should be followed when using SSML to enhance Text-to-Speech outputs?
questions.answer: Use SSML to improve prosody, pronunciation, and emotional expression while testing for appropriate output before production use.
